title: Textile, 1840–1845
medium:
Medium: wool and silk
Technique: applique and embroidery
description: Red and gray broadcloth embroidered and appliqued with multicolored silk and chenille in a design of medallions showing various figures; in a Persian-style. Gray wool fringe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1840–1845. Medium: wool and silk
Technique: applique and embroidery. 1936-1-1.
